Key Match Events: Virat Kohli remained not out on 55
Rohit Sharma reached a century off 63 balls
Hashmatullah Shahidi was lbw to Kuldeep Yadav for 80
Azmatullah Omarzai was bowled by Hardik Pandya for 62
Mohammad Nabi was lbw to Jasprit Bumrah for 19
Rashid Khan was caught by Kuldeep Yadav off Jasprit Bumrah for 16
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma was awarded the Player of the Match for his 131 runs
India won the match by 8 wickets with 90 balls remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi
India won 2 points and Afghanistan won 0 points
